paths.description: Operation to access node's environment variables
paths.summary: Operation to access node's environment variables

name: CoreAPI Settings_NodeEV
description: API to access the system variables
about:
Description

The CoreAPI Settings_NodeEV API enables to view the node's environment variables of the system. This information can be seen in the System Processes tool.

Prerequisites: In order for the API to work, you will have to change the endpoint in the General tab.

Operations performed

Important note: Please review the definitions and the request/response bodies for each operation.

/GetNodeEnvVars

View all node's environment variables. The response body will always be different for each system.

Body
Definition
Request
None
Response
Undefined
